markdownRemark.html:
This is an incredible of how the IT team in Obama’s Cabinet came up with healthcare.gov, which I daresay would give several silicon valley web-startups.. a run for their money.

It is the face of a new paradigm in Government outreach in the USA, where more than just having a website, it is important to see how usable that website is and what can be done with it.

frontmatter.title: Healthcare.gov : yes, the government can product useful websites
